A1.title: Welcome to Level A1
A1.text: This workbook is designed for beginner learners. At this level, you will practice simple sentences, everyday vocabulary, and basic reading skills. The articles focus on familiar topics like daily routines, animals, and hobbies. By the end of this book, you will be able to understand and use basic phrases to describe yourself and the world around you.

A2.title: Welcome to Level A2
A2.text: This workbook helps elementary learners expand their skills. You will encounter slightly longer texts, past tense narratives, and more varied vocabulary. The topics include travel, history, and culture. The goal is to help you understand sentences and frequently used expressions related to areas of most immediate relevance.

B1.title: Welcome to Level B1
B1.text: This workbook is for intermediate learners ready to explore more complex ideas. The articles cover scientific topics, mysteries, and global issues. You will practice connecting thoughts, expressing opinions, and understanding main points of clear standard input. This level bridges the gap between basic communication and independent language use.
